text: @realDonaldTrump Hey, stupid, in spite o you letting COVID-19 into our country unabated, Governor Pritzker, and the State of Illinois had the greatest decrease in all categories of this virus   The Governor’s that listened to you have seen a spike new cases. Hmmm, I guess you were full of shit.
